projects.name: AI Traffic Wizard App
projects.description: Implemented solar panel sensors for intersection data collection and utilized camera-based video analysis for traffic and pedestrian monitoring. Create a cloud based user-friendly apps for drivers and passengers and pedestrians, which feels in real time traffic data to users.

projects.name: License Plate Detection
projects.description: Used YOLOv8 for the object detection in the image and the video. Also used SORT for the object tracking in real-time as the python library.

projects.name: AI and IoT Traffic Management
projects.description: Revolutionary AI-based Traffic Management System leveraging IoT and AI for optimized signal control, prioritizing pedestrian safety, and reducing crossing accidents. Aiming to boost traffic efficiency, foster sustainability, and expedite emergency service response.

full_output.name: SHASHANK SARASWAT
achievements_and_awards: Attained 55% in NPTEL Design and Analysis Exam
Secured 2nd Rank at the Mock Placement Drive.
Achieved 3rd Rank in the Hackathon organised by the Association of Computer Machinery of Manipal University Jaipur by showcasing the project of AI and IoT Traffic Management System.
Runners Up at the Village War (advanced version of Volunteers Dilemma) organised by the Indian Game Theory Society.
